Package util

Class Tools

java.lang.Object
util.Tools
public class Tools extends Object
Miscellaneous tools that do not fit into any other util class.

  • Method Details

    • pad

      public static String pad(String str, int width, char character)
      Pads a string to a given width with a given character. If the string is longer than the specified width, no change is made. If the given string is null, an empty string is returned.
      Parameters:
      str - the string to pad to the left.
      width - the minimum final width of the string.
      character - the character to pad with.
      Returns:
      a new string that is at least width characters long and padded to the left with the specified character.

    • getNextUpList

      public static List<String> getNextUpList(SchoolAPI schoolAPI, UserAPI userAPI, String timezone)
      Returns the list of next class information.
      Parameters:
      schoolAPI - school information to use.
      userAPI - user information to use.
      timezone - the unix TZ identifier for the school.
      Returns:
      the list of next class information.

    • getNextUpList

      public static List<String> getNextUpList(SchoolAPI schoolAPI, UserAPI userAPI, String timezone, UTCTime now)
      Returns the list of next class information.
      Parameters:
      schoolAPI - school information to use.
      userAPI - user information to use.
      timezone - the unix TZ identifier for the school.
      now - the time to get the next up information for.
      Returns:
      the list of next class information.
